meaningMnemonic: Your <radical>thread</radical>s have to <radical>suit</radical> you if you want a good <kanji>salary</kanji>. No one is going to give you a salary if your clothes don't suit you. You have to look professional!
readingMnemonic: Your <kanji>salary</kanji> is paid in <reading>cu</reading>cumbers (きゅう). Maybe you shouldn't have worn that cucumber tie when you interviewed for this job, even though it suited you well.
